about_the_game:
SnowRunner returned to Dakar Desert Rally! Get ready to extend your off-road rally experience with the SnowRunner Cars! Drive five of the most powerful Cars from SnowRunner and overcome extreme open-world environments, either in Free-Roam mode or in Rally Raid competition:

Check the iconic cars from SnowRunner capable of overcoming any danger:

SnowRunner Cars:
– TUZ 166
– DON 71
– KHAN 39
– KHAN 317
– KHAN L04F

SnowRunner Rally Events
Sport Game Mode (6xStages)
– SnowRunner Challenge (6x Stages

Professional Game Mode(3xStages)
– SnowRunner Challenge (3x Stages)
detailed_description:
SnowRunner returned to Dakar Desert Rally! Get ready to extend your off-road rally experience with the SnowRunner Cars! Drive five of the most powerful Cars from SnowRunner and overcome extreme open-world environments, either in Free-Roam mode or in Rally Raid competition:

Check the iconic cars from SnowRunner capable of overcoming any danger:

SnowRunner Cars:
– TUZ 166
– DON 71
– KHAN 39
– KHAN 317
– KHAN L04F

SnowRunner Rally Events
Sport Game Mode (6xStages)
– SnowRunner Challenge (6x Stages

Professional Game Mode(3xStages)
– SnowRunner Challenge (3x Stages)
name: Dakar Desert Rally - SnowRunner Cars Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB) / Radeon RX 570 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790k / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 (8GB) / Radeon RX5700 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard

short_description: SnowRunner Cars join the world of Dakar! Drive five new vehicles in Rally Raid competition or Free-Roam mode and level up your off-road experience.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
